bill_title: allow persons with advanced degrees to teach in the long distance learning system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow persons with advanced degrees to teach in the long distance learning system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-42 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any person who holds a doctoral degree or other terminal degree awarded by an accredited graduate school may teach in the person's field of study in long distance learning regardless of whether the person holds a teaching certificate under chapter 13-42. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
